post.author: OSIAS
post.body:
Hola,

I am looking for a .bsp entity reader tool for the old RTCW not the latest installment. I am adding bots to some old maps of mine and I need to find a particular entity # and everywhere I traverse the forums are quite dead. So I am hoping someone here might help me.

From my understand "Hobbit's BSP Reader" is the exact tool I need but I can not find anywhere to download it and I have literally spent hours looking for it.

Help

I tried opening the bsp in notepad but it didnt provide the the specific information I need. Looked at other programs and so far none do what I want.

post.author: TinMan
post.body:
The splash damage forums might be a better place to look around.
http://www.splashdamage.com/forums/
q3map2 (which happens to have it's 'official support' forum there) can decompile maps I think.
